O.k. here's your chance to approve some weapons for
Shadow Star or not.

1. A blaster mounted on his wrist to keep his hands
free.

2. A metallic boomerang that comes out of that
blaster.

3. A boa that also comes out of his blaster.

Also I move that we officially move that to save space
and shorten titles a name in parenthese before a post
title becomes the official sign for (read this
whoever) be it member, faction, or everyone. And do me
a favor and have one of your Maximal chars pick up
Cutie's message. Is anyone even reading my posts for
him.

--- robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote:
> OOC: Keep telling yourself that. I havent ever had a
